title: Budget Saving Travel Tips
text:
0 
Everyone loves to travel and enjoy their lives going out of their home towns, but at the same time everyone is concern about their bank balance. People somehow plan at least one trip a year for themselves and their family so that they could have a break from their daily routine. You would be happy to find some budget saving travelling tips, after working on these trouble free tips you would be able to go out twice on a tour instead of one. 
Airline costs 
Ticket Booking: Work out in advance about the dates of your trip, booking of an airline tickets some time before will do a work of dam for your bank balance. In advance booking you will definitely get the best fare of any airline. 
Belongings: More the luggage larger the amount charged by airlines. Now a day's every airline charges some amount depending on the weight and number of bags you are carrying with you. So try to pack light weight of luggage with only one or two number of bags. Give a thought to pack some old cloths so that you can do a shopping of new ones and can fit them in your only bag carrying with you. 
Opt for Round Trip Tickets: Mostly one way trips tickets are high priced than the round trip tickets, so prefer the round trip tickets to save your hard earned money. Everyone is not comfortable with connecting flights but connecting flights can save you a big amount of cash so don't feel uneasy while booking for connecting flights. 
Foreign Currency 
Medium of Exchange: It is not easy to get a good exchange rate from anywhere, first search about the exchange rate of currency of that particular country you are going for a trip from any search engine. It would be more advantageous for you to do an exchange of your local currency on the airport of your tour destination or from the bank of that country only. 
Place to Stay 
Stopover in Neighboring Town: It is well known by every people that the hotels in tourist places have much higher rates, think something new this time take a 10 to 15 min ride to the nearest town and stay in hotel there. You are going to save a good amount of money and side by side having a new experience of visiting neighboring town. 
Do surfing or call to hotels: Just getting the quotation from one hotel and booking a room with same one is not fair enough. Do some surfing on internet and call at least 5 to 6 number of hotels, get the price list, ask them to give some complementary things, compare the list of hotels and then decide in which hotel you are going to check in. 
Conveyance 
Complimentary Tickets: If you are travelling through train, buses or metros then instead if purchasing tickets every time make a pass for that much of time period you have a plan to stay in that particular country, travelling by having pass will be time saving and profitable for you. 
Travelling through Public transport: The easiest way of getting from one point to another for every people is hiring a taxi, everyone consider taking taxi for trouble free ride. Avoid taking taxis and travel by public transports available there. 
Dining 
Carry something with you: sometime it is not possible to go out and have breakfast and supper while you are busy in enjoying your tour, it would be a good idea to carry light weight snacks in your hand bag so that you can eat them anywhere you feel tickling in your stomach. 
Say No to Hotel Meal: We all know that the meal served in hotel is of much higher price than the local cafes of the tourists places, so avoid taking meal from hotels until it is very necessary for you, take a walk and find some really good local cafe with good price and good meal to kill your hungriness and save your money. 
Look to Buy 
Tax Saving Shopping: Some countries provide you forms for tax saving, what you have to do is to fill that form and have to show them a proof of our shopping abroad. By doing this formality you can save a bundle. 
Look for Discounts: In every country there are some shops supplying products with discount. Go for these discounted items or thing with a printed bill. 
Follow these lenient tips and save a big amount of your bank balance, and be happy and be ready to go out for your second tour.
